channel.title: CVE Feed for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Batch Admin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Spring by Pivotal -- Spring Batch Admin

item.title: CVE-2018-1230|2024-08-05T03:51:48.986Z -- spring%20by%20pivotal -- spring%20batch%20admin
item.description: Pivotal Spring Batch Admin, all versions, does not contain cross site request forgery protection. A remote unauthenticated user could craft a malicious site that executes requests to Spring Batch Admin. This issue has not been patched because Spring Batch Admin has reached end of life.

item.title: CVE-2018-1229|2024-08-05T03:51:48.971Z -- spring%20by%20pivotal -- spring%20batch%20admin
item.description: Pivotal Spring Batch Admin, all versions, contains a stored XSS vulnerability in the file upload feature. An unauthenticated malicious user with network access to Spring Batch Admin could store an arbitrary web script that would be executed by other users. This issue has not been patched because Spring Batch Admin has reached end of life.
